title: Hawks & doves
creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts and Brian Rapsey
brief_description: A sailor abandons his military duties and tries to hide himself from the national coverage of his desertion, and the war escalating in the Gulf. He finds comfort with his Uncle who served in Vietnam, but clashes with his father who did not go to war. Cast includes Andrew Mayne, Dorothy Blayney and Phillip Motherwell.
